byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Conf with A MacLeish on sale of destroyers to Brit
snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 1--It became known here today that at least one of the approaches to Wendell L. Willkie. with the object of getting a "clearance" for the President on delicate steps in foreign policy, was made by Archibald MacLeish, the Librarian...

headline.main: Willkie Is Cool to Administration Feeler To Acquiesce in Sale of Old Destroyers

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 1--It became known here today that at least one of the approaches to Wendell L. Willkie. with the object of getting a "clearance" for the President on delicate steps in foreign policy, was made by Archibald MacLeish, the Librarian of Congress.
